page.title: 05Local Government,Winchfield
page.content: The block falls entirely within the {Hart District}of N.E.Hampshire & consists of parts of the Parishes of Winchfield,Hartley Wintney, Crookham Village, Dogmersfield & the Township of Fleet. Hart District Council is responsible for refuse collection in the area & they also deal with planning applications. The Parish Councils deal with smaller issues & have representatives on the District Council. Most of the block falls within the{Parish of Winchfield.}This is a very rural Parish with a {population}of only 425. The Parish Council meets 4 times a year in the village hall with an annual general meeting on the 5th occasion. {Public Services}are supplied by 'Southern Gas',Mid-Southern Water Company' & 'Southern Electricity Board'.
